}}}
<<tiddler HideTiddlerTags>>{{small smallform{
<html><form style='display:inline;white-space:nowrap;' onsubmit='this.pavysisku.click();return false;'>
<table><tr><td style='width:33%;font-size:1.4em;'>
search for <input name=pattern style='width:auto;font-size:1.4em;' value='' title='enter search pattern' autofocus>
<input type=button style='width:auto;font-size:1.0em;'  name=pavysisku  value=' Go !' onclick="
var f=this.form;
var target=f.nextSibling; removeChildren(target);
var arrRestStr=[];
var outa=[];
var outb=[];
var outc=[];
var outd=[];
var oute=[];
var Bouta=[];
var Boutb=[];
var Boutc=[];
var Boutd=[];
var Boute=[];
var Couta=[];
var Coutb=[];
var Coutc=[];
var Coutd=[];
var Coute=[];
var tempa;
var tempb='';
var tempc;
var tempd;
var tempe;
var tb='[^\t]*?\t';
var fpvd;
var sle='>|>|@@margin-top:0px;padding-left:0.5em;padding-right:0.5em;font-size:1em;float:right;font-weight:normal;border:1px solid #393939;margin-top:-1px;color:#fff;background:#db4;display:block;//<nowiki>';
var slewhite='>|>|@@margin-top:0px;padding-left:0.5em;padding-right:0.5em;font-size:1em;float:right;font-weight:normal;border:1px solid #222;margin-top:-1px;color:#fff;background:#999;display:block;//<nowiki>';
Array.prototype.diff = function(a) {
    return this.filter(function(i) {return !(a.indexOf(i) > -1);});
};

var tids=store.getTaggedTiddlers('dic');
fpv = f.pattern.value.toLowerCase();
fpvd=fpv.replace(/a/img,'[ĀāÁáǍǎÀàAa]').replace(/e/img,'[ĒēÉéĚěÈèEe]').replace(/i/img,'[ĪīÍíǏǐÌìIi]').replace(/o/img,'[ŌōÓóǑǒÒòOo]').replace(/u/img,'[ŪūÚúǓǔÙùUuǕǖǗǘǙǚǛǜÜü]');
if(fpv.length == 0) return;
for (var t=0; t<tids.length; t++) {

	arrRestStr=store.getTiddlerText(tids[t].title,'').split('\n');
//precise
	tempa=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+fpv+'\t','i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempa);
	//tempb=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+'(|[^\t]*?[;\.])'+fpv+'[;\.\t]','i')));
	//arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempb);
	tempc=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+'(|[^\t]*?[;\.,])'+fpv+'[;\.,\t]','i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempc);
	if (tempa.length+tempb.length+tempc.length>0) outa = outa.concat([sle+tids[t].title+'</nowiki>//@@']);
	outa = outa.concat(tempa.slice(0,30)).concat(tempc.slice(0,30));
//now vague
	tempd=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+'(|[^\t]*?[;\., ])'+fpv+'[;\., \t]','i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempd);
	tempe=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+'(|[^\t]*?)'+fpv,'i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempe);
	if (tempd.length+tempe.length>0) outd = outd.concat([slewhite+tids[t].title+'</nowiki>//@@']);
	outd = outd.concat(tempd.slice(0,30)).concat(tempe.slice(0,30));
//Bout precise
	tempa=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+fpvd+'\t','i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempa);
	//tempb=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+'(|[^\t]*?[;\.])'+fpvd+'[;\.\t]','i')));
	//arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempb);
	tempc=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+'(|[^\t]*?[;\.,])'+fpvd+'[;\.,\t]','i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempc);
	if (tempa.length+tempb.length+tempc.length>0) Bouta = Bouta.concat([sle+tids[t].title+'</nowiki>//@@']);
	Bouta = Bouta.concat(tempa.slice(0,30)).concat(tempc.slice(0,30));
	//Boutb = Boutb.concat(tempb.slice(0,30));
//now vague
	tempd=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+'(|[^\t]*?[;\., ])'+fpvd+'[;\., \t]','i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempd);
	tempe=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+'(|[^\t]*?)'+fpvd,'i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempe);
	if (tempd.length+tempe.length>0) Boutd = Boutd.concat([slewhite+tids[t].title+'</nowiki>//@@']);
	Boutd = Boutd.concat(tempd.slice(0,30)).concat(tempe.slice(0,30));
//Cout precise
	tempa=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+tb+fpv+'$','i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempa);
	//tempb=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+tb+'(|[^\t]*?[;\.])'+fpv+'([;\.\t]|$)','i')));
	//arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempb);
	tempc=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+tb+'(|[^\t]*?[;\.,])'+fpv+'([;\.,\t]|$)','i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempc);
	if (tempa.length+tempb.length+tempc.length>0) Couta = Couta.concat([sle+tids[t].title+'</nowiki>//@@']);
	Couta = Couta.concat(tempa.slice(0,30)).concat(tempc.slice(0,30));
	//Coutb = Coutb.concat(tempb.slice(0,30));
//now vague
	tempd=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+tb+'(|[^\t]*?[;\., ])'+fpv+'([;\., \t]|$)','i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempd);
	tempe=arrRestStr.filter(/./.test.bind(new RegExp('^'+tb+tb+'(|[^\t]*?)'+fpv,'i')));
	arrRestStr = arrRestStr.diff(tempe);
	if (tempd.length+tempe.length>0) Coutd = Coutd.concat([slewhite+tids[t].title+'</nowiki>//@@']);
	Coutd = Coutd.concat(tempd.slice(0,30)).concat(tempe.slice(0,30));
}
//concat all arrays, reformat to tw-table formatting
if (outa.length>0) outa = ['>\t>\t!in characters:'].concat(outa);
if (Bouta.length>0) Bouta = ['>\t>\t!in pinyin (non-diacritic sensitive):'].concat(Bouta);
if (Couta.length>0) Couta = ['>\t>\t!in translation:'].concat(Couta);
if (outa.length+Bouta.length+Couta.length>0) outa = ['>\t>\t!PRECISE SEARCH'].concat(outa);

//vague search output
if (outd.length>0) outd = ['>\t>\tbackground-color:#999;!in characters:'].concat(outd);
if (Boutd.length>0) Boutd = ['>\t>\tbackground-color:#999;!in pinyin (non-diacritic sensitive):'].concat(Boutd);
if (Coutd.length>0) Coutd = ['>\t>\tbackground-color:#999;!in translation:'].concat(Coutd);
if (outd.length+Boutd.length+Coutd.length>0) outd = ['>\t>\tbackground-color:#999;!SEQUENCE SEARCH'].concat(outd);
tids = outa.concat(Bouta).concat(Couta).concat(outd).concat(Boutd).concat(Coutd).join('\n').replace(/(^|\t|$)/img,'|');

//output this fucking string!
if (tids.length>3) wikify(tids,target);
"></td></tr></table></form><div></div></html>
}}}
config.messages.backstage.open.text="";
config.messages.backstage.close.text="";
config.options.chkShowRightSidebar=false;
config.options.txtToggleRightSideBarLabelShow="jbobau";
config.options.txtToggleRightSideBarLabelHide="jbobau";
config.options.chkSinglePageMode=true;
config.options.chkSinglePagePermalink=true;
